title: Interactive Demo
description: Experience Vaultic Crypto Engine's capabilities directly in your browser. All cryptographic operations happen locally - no data leaves your device.

keyGeneration.title: Key Generation
keyGeneration.description: Generate a secure RSA 2048-bit key pair or ECC P-256 key pairs for ECDH.
keyGeneration.security: Keys include protection against timing attacks (RSA)
keyGeneration.publicKeyTooltip: Anyone can use this key to encrypt messages that only you can decrypt (RSA) or to derive a shared secret (ECDH)
keyGeneration.privateKeyTooltip: Keep this key secret! It's used to decrypt messages (RSA) or derive a shared secret (ECDH)
keyGeneration.privateKeyInfo: Keep this RSA key secure - never share your private key

encryption.title: Encryption (RSA / ECDH)
encryption.description: Encrypt a message with the RSA public key or using an ECDH-derived shared secret (AES-GCM). Hybrid RSA+AES encryption is automatically used for larger messages in RSA mode.
encryption.usingHybridRsa: Hybrid RSA+AES encryption was used for this large message.

decryption.title: Decryption (RSA / ECDH)
decryption.description: Decrypt a message with the RSA private key or using an ECDH-derived shared secret (AES-GCM).
decryption.matchMessage: The decrypted message matches the original. The encryption/decryption cycle is complete and verified.
decryption.mismatchMessage: The decrypted message differs from the original input.

protection.title: Key/Message Protection
protection.description: Protect your RSA key pair or any message with a password. ECDH key protection is not currently supported.

security.title: Secure Operations
security.description: RSA or hybrid RSA+AES for encryption. ECDH for key agreement, AES-GCM for symmetric encryption.

systemLogs.generatingKeyPair: Generating RSA 2048-bit key pair with secure entropy...
systemLogs.publicKeyGeneratedUser: Vaultic Public key generated for User {{user}} ({{length}} chars)
systemLogs.privateKeyGeneratedUser: Vaultic Private key generated for User {{user}} ({{length}} chars)
systemLogs.keyPairProtection: RSA key pairs include Vaultic's additional Marvin attack protections
systemLogs.keyPairSuccess: ✅ Vaultic RSA key pair successfully generated!
systemLogs.keyGenError: ❌ Error in Vaultic RSA key generation: {{message}}
systemLogs.generatingEcdhKeyPair: Generating ECDH P-256 key pair for User {{user}}...
systemLogs.ecdhKeyPairSuccess: ✅ Vaultic ECDH P-256 key pair for User {{user}} successfully generated!
systemLogs.ecdhKeyGenError: ❌ Error in Vaultic ECDH key generation: {{error}}
systemLogs.noMessageError: ⚠️ Please enter a message to process
systemLogs.noKeyPairError: ⚠️ Please generate a key pair first
systemLogs.noEcdhKeyPairsError: ⚠️ Please generate ECDH key pairs for both User A and User B
systemLogs.derivingSecretEcdh: Deriving ECDH shared secret (P-256) between User {{userA}} and User {{userB}}...
systemLogs.encryptingMessageEcdh: Vaultic engine encrypting message with derived secret (AES-GCM, {{bytes}} bytes)...
systemLogs.hybridNotice: Large data automatically handled with hybrid RSA+AES encryption (RSA)
systemLogs.privateKeyOnly: The message can now only be decrypted with the matching private key (RSA)
systemLogs.decryptingMessageEcdh: Vaultic engine decrypting message with derived secret (AES-GCM)...
systemLogs.wrongKeyError: This could be due to data corruption or using the wrong private key (RSA)
systemLogs.noKeyToProtect: ⚠️ No RSA key pair available to protect
systemLogs.protectingKeyPair: Protecting RSA key pair with password...
systemLogs.ecdhKeyProtectionNotSupported: ⚠️ Key pair protection with password is not currently supported for ECDH keys.
systemLogs.noMessageToProtect: ⚠️ Please enter a message to protect
systemLogs.demoReset: Vaultic demo reset. Ready for new session.

errors.noEcdhKeysForEncryption: User A private key and User B public key are required for ECDH encryption
errors.noEcdhKeysForDecryption: User B private key and User A public key are required for ECDH decryption

cryptoModeSelector.title: Select Cryptography Mode
cryptoModeSelector.rsaDescription: For encryption/decryption of messages and password-based key pair protection.
cryptoModeSelector.ecdhDescription: For key agreement (ECDH P-256) and message encryption/decryption with AES-GCM using the derived shared secret.
